        bug-1890828.sh ..................................................[OK]

        bug-1892227.sh ..................................................[OK]

ENTER: quex/core_engine/generator/TEST
DATE:  Fri Dec  5 08:12:49 2008
TITLE: Code Generation for Lexical Analyzer


-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 -- Buffer Reload:

    Backwards;
        test-backward_loading.py Cpp_ASSERTS ............................[OK]
                                 Cpp ....................................[OK]
                                 ANSI-C-ASSERTS .........................[OK]
                                 ANSI-C .................................[OK]
    Forward Position Adaption
        test-position_adaption.py Cpp_ASSERTS ...........................[OK]
                                  Cpp ...................................[OK]
                                  ANSI-C-ASSERTS ........................[OK]
                                  ANSI-C ................................[OK]
    No Backward Reload -- Precondition at Border
        test-no-backward-reloading.py Cpp_ASSERTS .......................[OK]
                                      Cpp ...............................[OK]
                                      ANSI-C-ASSERTS ....................[OK]
                                      ANSI-C ............................[OK]

 -- CONTINUE:

    (special use case)
        test-continue-without-return-2.py ANSI-C-PlainMemory ............[OK]
                                          ANSI-C ........................[OK]
                                          Cpp ...........................[OK]
    Mode Changes
        test-mode-changes.py ANSI-C-PlainMemory .........................[OK]
                             ANSI-C .....................................[OK]
                             Cpp ........................................[OK]
    Reentry analysis without return from function
        test-continue-without-return.py ANSI-C-PlainMemory ..............[OK]
                                        ANSI-C ..........................[OK]
                                        Cpp .............................[OK]

 -- Post Conditions:

    Part 1
        test-post-conditions.py ANSI-C-PlainMemory ......................[OK]
                                ANSI-C ..................................[OK]
                                Cpp .....................................[OK]
    Part 2
        test-post-conditions-2.py ANSI-C-PlainMemory ....................[OK]
                                  ANSI-C ................................[OK]
                                  Cpp ...................................[OK]
    Part 3
        test-post-conditions-3.py ANSI-C-PlainMemory ....................[OK]
                                  ANSI-C ................................[OK]
                                  Cpp ...................................[OK]

 -- Pre Conditions:

    Multiple Identical Pre-Conditions
        test-pre-conditions-3.py ANSI-C-PlainMemory .....................[OK]
                                 ANSI-C .................................[OK]
                                 Cpp ....................................[OK]
    Part 1
        test-pre-conditions.py ANSI-C-PlainMemory .......................[OK]
                               ANSI-C ...................................[OK]
                               Cpp ......................................[OK]
    Part 2
        test-pre-conditions-2.py ANSI-C-PlainMemory .....................[OK]
                                 ANSI-C .................................[OK]
                                 Cpp ....................................[OK]

 -- Pre- and Post- Conditions:

    Simple
        test-pre-post-condition.py ANSI-C-PlainMemory ...................[OK]
                                   ANSI-C ...............................[OK]
                                   Cpp ..................................[OK]

 -- Pseudo Ambgiguous Post Condition:

    Part I
        test-pseudo_ambiguous_post_conditions.py ANSI-C-PlainMemory .....[OK]
                                                 ANSI-C .................[OK]
                                                 Cpp ....................[OK]
    Part II
        test-pseudo_ambiguous_post_conditions-2.py ANSI-C-PlainMemory ...[OK]
                                                   ANSI-C ...............[OK]
                                                   Cpp ..................[OK]

 -- Simple:

    Begin of Line (BOL), End of Line (EOL)
        test-bol-eol.py ANSI-C-PlainMemory ..............................[OK]
                        ANSI-C ..........................................[OK]
                        Cpp .............................................[OK]
    Keywords 'for', 'forest', 'forester', and 'formidable'
        test-simple-5.py ANSI-C-PlainMemory .............................[OK]
                         ANSI-C .........................................[OK]
                         Cpp ............................................[OK]
    Maximum Length Match
        test-simple-2.py ANSI-C-PlainMemory .............................[OK]
                         ANSI-C .........................................[OK]
                         Cpp ............................................[OK]
    Special Case '.' (drop out on valid target state)
        test-simple-3.py ANSI-C-PlainMemory .............................[OK]
                         ANSI-C .........................................[OK]
                         Cpp ............................................[OK]
    Tiny Expressions
        test-simple.py ANSI-C-PlainMemory ...............................[OK]
                       ANSI-C ...........................................[OK]
                       Cpp ..............................................[OK]

        test-single-state-transitions-y.py ..............................[OK]

        test-single-state-transitions.py ................................[OK]

                                 ANSI-C .................................[OK]

        test-skip-trigger-set-2.py 3 ....................................[OK]

                            ANSI-C ......................................[OK]
                            Cpp .........................................[OK]

                              3 .........................................[OK]
                              4 .........................................[OK]
                              5 .........................................[OK]

                              2 .........................................[OK]
                              3 .........................................[OK]
                              4 .........................................[OK]

                              DL=2 ......................................[OK]
                              DL=3 ......................................[OK]
                              DL=4 ......................................[OK]

                                      ADAPT .............................[OK]
